oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Organic olive oil from Italy
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Santucci, Fabio M.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Markets and trade
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This presentation covers the production of conventional and organic olive oil and its trade from Italy to USA; it explains which type of controls are applied to conventional oils, as well as to GI oils and to organic ones.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Santucci, Fabio M. (2007) Organic olive oil from Italy. Speech at: Meeting at Italian Embassy, Washington DC, November 2007.
